name: Custom Snake (2019)
description:
Custom Snake is a game I created as a final project for my AP Computer Science Principles class in 2019, and my first full(-ish) game.

The game is my interpretation of the classic Snake as a roguelite. Start from nothing and grow your Snake skills in order to upgrade abilities and visuals!

**IMPORTANT: PRESSING THE QUIT BUTTON WILL CRASH THE GAME!**
